title: Arclight velkoz
body: I've given way too much money to this game for this fucking skin (Arclight velkoz) and the only thing it does is bug out...  not only auto attacks and general movement but also the entire screen with light beams everywhere .. This has been going on for over a month now .. arn't people getting paid to fix bugs like this?

replies.body:
Hey TheCoolForest,

We're currently investigating this issue (it's not as easy of a fix as we thought).  We're looking to get a fix in ASAP.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=gz2klYAl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-10T22:34:39.141+0000)

I find it disturbing that it hasn't been disabled from the store. It seems irresponsible to keep selling defective product.
